message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this incredible product that I think you'll love. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $750000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice, but I think $750000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $600000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value and rarity you mentioned.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $600000. I'm open to further negotiations, but I'm not willing to go below this price.
